transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji mam.
Executive: Ya ha ji main India Mart se baat kar rahi hu sir.
Customer: Ji mam. Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hanji. Hanji sir.
Customer: Aapne wo wo kiya tha ticket open kiya tha na sir.
Customer: Ji mam.
Executive: India Mart pe. Bataye kya dikkat hai sir aap? Kya dikkat hai?
Customer: Mam ye ID activate ho gayi lekin
Executive: Wallet consume nahi ho rahi hai.
Executive: ID activate ho gayi but wallet consume nahi ho rahi hai. Sir aapke paas service nahi hai na to wallet kahan se consume hogi?
Customer: Mam service to hai na abhi January tak hai December tak ki.
Executive: Sir aapko ye information kisne diya tha jo aapki service December tak hai?
Customer: Mam.
Executive: Aapse meri baat ye laga ke third time ho rahi hai sir.
Customer: Third time ho rahi hai mam malum nahi hai.
Executive: Haan ye laga ke third time aapse baat ho rahi hai aur itni baar aapko bar bar inform kiya gaya tha aapki service October tak ki thi. Aap ek baar check kijiyega aapne 4 October ko payment kiya tha 2022 mein India Mart ko teen saal ki service ka part payment mein payment kiya tha 38 35000 ek baar mein fir 15-15000 karke aapne UPI kiya tha. Theek hai? To aapki jo service ka date tha wo date tha sir 22 October. To aapki service 22 October ko already download ho chuki hai.
Customer: Achcha sir mam. Ha sir mam ek cheez aur ye janna tha ki suppose kariye mam hum service activate karate hain. Haan abhi payment karke. Haan. To wo kya disable wali problem rahegi ya fir wo nahi rahegi?
Executive: Nahi sir wo problem to rahegi aapki service abhi India Mart pe activate nahi ho sakti hai kyunki isme bahut sara buyer supplier conflict tha jo aapne kafi late se resolve kiya hai.
Customer: Ji mam.
Executive: Haan is vajah se aapki service abhi aur activate nahi ho sakti hai.
Executive: Isme hum log service nahi de sakte hain ye paid supplier abhi nahi ho sakta hai agar koi other GST aapke paas hai to maybe ho sakta hai.
Customer: Achcha mam ye paid supplier nahi ho payega abhi?
Executive: Nahi ye ye company abhi aapki India Mart pe paid supplier mein nahi aa payegi.
Customer: Achcha mam kab tak nahi aa payegi ya fir kabhi nahi aa payegi?
Executive: Sir ye to abhi ab ye GST number se to kabhi nahi aa payegi.
Customer: Achcha theek hai. Ye cheez hai ye GST number se kabhi nahi aa payegi.
Executive: Mainly dikkat kya hua tha sir itna jyada buyer supplier conflict aapka hai. Isi vajah se ye paid supplier se hat gayi. Kuch jyada hi buyer supplier conflict ticket yahan pe mujhe dikh raha hai aapka. Aur wo bhi solve bhi nahi ho pa raha tha bahut lamba lamba time laga solve hone mein sir. 25 October mein aapka last jo 25 October wala ticket tha isi vajah se aapki service band ho gayi.
Customer: Wahi cheez hai sir.
Executive: Haan 25 October mein bhi ek aapke paas aaya tha na ticket. Jise sorry 25 October nahi hai kya hai buyer supplier conflict deporter ha aaya tha deporter ka ek ticket tha. To ye sir ye sari itni sari buyer supplier conflict ki vajah se aapki company band ho chuki hai jo India Mart pe abhi to renewal aur iska koi bhi aap subscription lena chahoge wo nahi ho payega. Otherwise aur koi help aapko chahiye?
Customer: Nahi mam yahi help chahiye thi.
Executive: Wahi koi aur agar kyunki koi aur agar GST nahi hai aapke paas?
Customer: Mam abhi to nahi hai na.
Executive: Haan kyunki aap se sir kyunki aur ki baat hui thi to yahan pe maine wo dekha tha update pe dala hua tha to kisi aur ki GST aapke paas hai. To aap usme wo kar sakte hain aur aapne mail bhi kiya hai sir plan activate karwane ka.
Customer: Ji mam.
Executive: Disable ho gayi thi abhi enable ho chuki hai. Ye enable kab hui hai sir aapki ID?
Customer: Mam enable to pata nahi dikha raha tha. Humne din India Mart pe phone kiya to unhone bataya ki enable to ho gayi hai sir lekin free service chal rahi hai.
Executive: Okay okay nahi nahi aapka wo shayad buyer supplier wala conflict wala ticket band ho gaya na isliye shayad ye to enable ho gaya hai kyunki aur lekin abhi jo wo hai ek baar isme matlab aapka jo service ka hai wo sir main ek baar dekhti hu kya hai iska. Kya hai uska kya matlab scene hai matlab ye ho bhi sakta hai paid supplier kyunki maine isse pichli baar bhi aapse baat hua tha to maine apne team se pucha tha to unhone bola tha nahi abhi ye nahi ja sakti hai paid supplier pe. Koi aur GST hai to aap bataiye. Otherwise sir iska to koi solution abhi hamare paas se nahi nikal ke aayega aur abhi yahan pe se dekhiye agar wo jo direct inquiries vagaira bhi to bhi aapka normally bahut din se unenable tha to band hi ho gaya hoga. Abhi ek call aaya tha aaj aapke paas.
Customer: Ji ji India Mart haan.
Executive: Okay okay chaliye theek hai sir ab main ek baar baat karke aapko batati hu.
Customer: Theek hai mam.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's ID activated, wallet not consuming.

- Wants to know if disable problem will remain.

- Enquiring about service activation after payment.



Resolution:

- Informs service was till October, not December.

- Service cannot be activated due to buyer-supplier conflict.

- Paid supplier not possible with current GST.

- Advised to use another GST if available.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check and revert.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, activation, payment, gst, service
